title.rendered: Wedding Dress Brand Essense of Australia Delivers ‘A Love Like This’ in New Collection

content.rendered:
Timeless and modern wedding gowns for every bride


Essense of Australia Style D3634

LENEXA, Kan. - November 10, 2022 - (Newswire.com)

Globally-renowned wedding dress designer Essense of Australia celebrates "a love like this" in their latest collection. The new collection features classic wedding gowns with a fashionable twist and sophisticated silhouettes for every bridal style and love story. 

"Love is the most powerful and magical feeling, and our new Essense of Australia collection evokes the excitement and beauty of finding your soulmate," said Martine Harris, Chief Creative Officer of Essense of Australia. "The latest collection delivers traditional and elegant bridal designs with elevated, innovative details for brides of all shapes and sizes." 

The new Essense of Australia collection features eye-catching embellishments that allow brides to shine, both on and off the aisle. Shimmering beading, classic pearls and sparkly accents add a hint of head-turning glamour to each silhouette. Floral lace accents, full and frothy skirts, striking trains and dramatic sleeves add a swoon-worthy appeal, while off-the-shoulder necklines and delicate spaghetti straps elevate each dress for a memorable bridal moment.  

The new collection offers a wedding gown for every bride-to-be, from the modern minimalist who prefers a simple and sleek style and the ethereal goddess who wants to wear an easy, breezy silhouette to the refined romantic who dreams of walking down the aisle in an ultra-glamorous wedding gown. Discover all 29 new gowns, now available at a retailer near you. 

The latest Essense of Australia collection is offered in U.S. sizes 2 to 20, with many styles available in the EveryBody/EveryBride collection for U.S. sizes 22 to 34. Visit www.essensedesigns.com to view the entire collection and find a store. 

About Essense of Australia 

Essense of Australia is a leading international bridal design house and wholesaler that creates and manufactures award-winning gowns for independent bridal retailers throughout the world under labels Stella York, Essense of Australia, Martina Liana, Martina Liana Luxe and All Who Wander, as well as private label collection Oxford Street and bridesmaid label Sorella Vita. The Essense of Australia family of brands can be found at more than 1,200 retailers worldwide, including the U.S., Canada, U.K., Australia, New Zealand and throughout Europe. 


Contact Information:
Lindsay Santee
Associate Director of Strategic Communications
lindsays@essensedesigns.com
9139098623


Press Release Service by Newswire.com

Original Source: Wedding Dress Brand Essense of Australia Delivers 'A Love Like This' in New Collection

About Essense of Australia Essense of Australia is a leading international bridal design house and wholesaler that creates and manufactures award-winning gowns for independent bridal retailers throughout the world under labels Stella York, Essense of Australia, Martina Liana, Martina Liana Luxe and All Who Wander, as well as private label collection Oxford Street and bridesmaid label Sorella Vita. The Essense of Australia family of brands can be found at more than 1,200 retailers worldwide, including the U.S., Canada, U.K., Australia, New Zealand and throughout Europe. Contact Information: Lindsay Santee Associate Director of Strategic Communications lindsays@essensedesigns.com 9139098623 Press Release Service by Newswire.com Original Source: Wedding Dress Brand Essense of Australia Delivers 'A Love Like This' in New Collection

@graph.name: Wedding Dress Brand Essense of Australia Delivers ‘A Love Like This’ in New Collection - Beauty Ring Magazine
@graph.description: Timeless and modern wedding gowns for every bride Essense of Australia Style D3634 LENEXA, Kan. - November 10, 2022 - (Newswire.com) Globally-renowned wedding dress designer Essense of Australia celebrates "a love like this" in their latest collection. The new collection features classic wedding gowns with a fashionable twist and sophisticated silhouettes for every bridal style and love story. "Love is the most powerful and magical feeling, and our new Essense of Australia collection evokes the excitement and beauty of finding your soulmate," said Martine Harris, Chief Creative Officer of Essense of Australia. "The latest collection delivers traditional and elegant bridal designs with elevated, innovative details for brides of all shapes and sizes." The new Essense of Australia collection features eye-catching embellishments that allow brides to shine, both on and off the aisle. Shimmering beading, classic pearls and sparkly accents add a hint of head-turning glamour to each silhouette. Floral lace accents, full and frothy skirts, striking trains and dramatic sleeves add a swoon-worthy appeal, while off-the-shoulder necklines and delicate spaghetti straps elevate each dress for a memorable bridal moment. The new collection offers a wedding gown for every bride-to-be, from the modern minimalist who prefers a simple and sleek style and the ethereal goddess who wants to wear an easy, breezy silhouette to the refined romantic who dreams of walking down the aisle in an ultra-glamorous wedding gown. Discover all 29 new gowns, now available at a retailer near you. The latest Essense of Australia collection is offered in U.S. sizes 2 to 20, with many styles available in the EveryBody/EveryBride collection for U.S. sizes 22 to 34. Visit www.essensedesigns.com to view the entire collection and find a store. About Essense of Australia Essense of Australia is a leading international bridal design house and wholesaler that creates and manufactures award-winning gowns for independent bridal retailers throughout the world under labels Stella York, Essense of Australia, Martina Liana, Martina Liana Luxe and All Who Wander, as well as private label collection Oxford Street and bridesmaid label Sorella Vita. The Essense of Australia family of brands can be found at more than 1,200 retailers worldwide, including the U.S., Canada, U.K., Australia, New Zealand and throughout Europe. Contact Information: Lindsay Santee Associate Director of Strategic Communications lindsays@essensedesigns.com 9139098623 Press Release Service by Newswire.com Original Source: Wedding Dress Brand Essense of Australia Delivers 'A Love Like This' in New Collection
